articles.content:
Outgoing 1-Pacman Party-list Rep. Mikee Romero has been bitten by the ToyCon 2025 bug.
Romero and his son, Santi, joined the thousands of attendees to the long-running pop culture event Friday, June 13 at the SMX Convention Center in Manila.

articles.title: Games Workshop Just Can't Stop 'Horus Heresy' Scalpers
articles.description: This week's attempted launch of a new, final anthology in the long-running 'Warhammer 40K' prequel series once again drew the wrath of the the abominable intelligence.
articles.content: It’s become an unfortunate par for the course in modern collecting that if you want something, you’re no longer just racing against fellow fans who want it: you’re facing off against a bot army driven by scalpers who want to make a pretty profit on t... [5214 chars]

articles.title: Comelec: Random manual audit shows 99. 997% accuracy as of Friday afternoon
articles.description: With 722 out of the 762 ballot boxes from randomly-selected clustered precincts audited, the Commission on Elections (Comelec) on Friday said the partial results of the random manual audit (RMA) for the votes for Eleksyon 2025 have indicated 99.997% accuracy.
articles.content:
With the random manual audit (RMA) of the automated elections nearing its completion, Commission on Elections chairman George Garcia on Friday said that the RMA has so far indicated 99.997% accuracy by the machines used in Eleksyon 2025.
Some 762 bal... [1320 chars]

articles.title: Two men jailed for their roles in theft of £4.75m gold toilet from Blenheim Palace
articles.description: The fully functioning 18-carat gold artwork was stolen from Blenheim Palace in September 2019. James Sheen and Michael Jones were part of the gang who planned and carried out the burglary.
articles.content:
Two men have been jailed for their roles in the theft of a £4.75m gold toilet from Blenheim Palace.
James Sheen, 40, and Michael Jones, 39, were part of the gang who planned and carried out the burglary of the Oxfordshire stately home.

articles.title: Pakistan stocks drop over 1,900 points amid Israel-Iran tensions
articles.description: KARACHI: The Pakistan Stock Exchange (PSX) plunged more than 1,900 points on Friday, as investor sentiment soured following Israel’s strikes on Iran, triggering fears of wider regional escalation. The benchmark KSE-100 index fell 1,949.56 points, or 1.57 percent, closing at 122,143.56, down from the previous close of 124,093.12. Shares traded largely in the red, mirroring

articles.title: Canadian killed in Air India crash was Ontario-based dentist: family
articles.description: The Canadian citizen believed to be on an Air India flight that crashed shortly after takeoff is a dentist who worked in Mississauga, Ont., her family has confirmed.
articles.content:
